entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haines Junction
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Haines Junction 3:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
